sourcesContent: import React,{useState} from 'react'; import {Row,Col,Toast,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' export const NotificateionsAlert = (state) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); return ( setShow(state)} show={show} delay={3000} autohide> Notification 11 mins ago Woohoo, you're reading this text in a Toast! ); } export default NotificateionsAlert;
